verses.text: Mamin Jehová, t'a smasanil in k'ool ol vak' yuj diosal t'ayach, ol ach in b'itej t'a yichanh juntzanh dios.

Ol in em cuman t'ayach t'a stojolal a templo to icnhej yaji, yuj vak'an yuj diosal t'ayach yuj a wach'k'olal, yujto tzaq'uelk'och tas tzala'. Ix ik'chaanh a b'i yet' a lolonel t'a yib'anh masanil tastac.
Ix ach tak'vi t'ayin ayic ix in avaj t'ayach, ix ak'an vip.
Masanil eb' rey t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ol yal wach' lolonel eb' t'ayach ayic ol yab'an eb' tas alnaccani.
Ol yal wach' lolonel eb' t'ayach yuj tastac a b'onac, yujto te niwan yelk'och a b'inajnaquil.
Wach'chom te niwan elk'ochi, palta tz'ok' a k'ol t'a eb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui, haxo eb' syik'chaanh sb'a, max ach b'atlaj q'uelan t'a eb'.
Ayic ay in ek' t'a skal tas ay smay, pitzan innhej uuj, tzak'ancot a poder, tzin a colanel t'a yoval eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
Ach Jehová, ol ach och ved'oc yic wach'nhej tzin elk'och t'a tas tza na t'ayin. Ha a wach'k'olal aynhejek' t'a masanil tiempo. Ha tastac ix iq'uel yich t'ayin, mocab' kan xepan.
